attributes.action: Fare pay for UK nursing staff
attributes.additional_details:
The amount of stress, responsibility and accountability is heaped on nursing staff in the UK more day by day. Nowadays nursing staff do more of the work preformed by junior medical staff in the past, but their pay does not match their workload.

Nursing pay should increase to  be in line with other degree professions in the UK.

rejection.details: Please see: 'Increase Nurses wages to at least £30,000 per annum'
